DOC.brief_summary: Diabetes is more frequent in women with Turner syndrome. The purpose of this study is to see, in what ways the glucose metabolism is different in this study population. The hypothesis is that women with Turner Syndrome have an impaired insulin production (beta cell function).
DOC.brief_title: Beta Cell Function in Women With Turner Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Turner syndrome Diagnosed diabetes BMI>30 Untreated cardiac or thyroid disease Cancer illness
